title: Can you help me find this song 39:30 minutes? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is a tough one. Even as a native English speaker with a good ear for lyrics, it is very hard to pick out many of the vocals under the show dialog. I cought “the time is rite, my heart is set, invite me…) The word Time could possibly be Tide, but google just goes back to the Blondie song “The Tide Is High”, and not much beyond that. The closest I got is Sassa’s 1988 “When The Time is Rite”   It’s close, but sadly, I don’t think it is the same tune though. It does seem to be from the same era, late 80s-early 90s, AND the same style freestyle/club, and even has the same feel as what was big in Miami during the time. Think Miami Vice! Hope this helps.
